entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Ottawa (Kanata - Orléans)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:29 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow Shower and Blowing Snow, -9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 11:44 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Heavy Snow Shower and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -11.4°C
Wind: SSW 40 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
